about_the_game:
Mix the elements from your magical dice to create powerful spells and fight your way through enemies to reclaim the castle from demons and win the princesses hand in marriage ❤️

Wildmagic Wizardry is a Spell Mixing, Dice Rolling, Strategy rogue like. Collect unique items and elemental gems to increase your power as you progress through the game. Making each run unique as you find a playstyle most fun for you!

Features
  • Turn based grid combat
  • Collect new dice to create new spells
  • Earn powerful rewards to drastically increase your combat abilities
  • Use your enemy codex to carefully plan each turn and outmaneuver your opponents
  • New map and encounters generated each time - never have two runs the same
